verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
[Verse]
For the Lamb has conqured
I will follow him
to the ends of the earth
I will follow him

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
[Chorus]
Jesus You're worthy
of every tribe and tongue
All for your glory
Till every soul is won

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
[Bridge]
The harvest is ready
We have to go
We won't stop
Till the whole world knows
The power in Your blood
To save every soul
We're not ashamed of the gospel

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
[Outro]
I will preach the gospel
Die and be forgotten
As long as you get the glory
